activities: Zapier offers a Software as Service (SaaS)-based integration solution to its customers, including customers from the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland. The platform enables Zapier customers exchange information between other SaaS-based services. Customers may include personal information within the data transferred on the Zapier platform, however this is not the purpose of the platform or its intended use. Zapier does not control or supervises the data inserted on its platform by its customers or their customers. Zapier only interacts with such data by transferring and storing it in digital format, irrespective of content value or sensitivity.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: All data is covered by our privacy policy. We do not manually process data.
